EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne Tour_PARENT_2019.STL Post Event No Show
EmailTemplate.subject: We’re sorry to have missed you at SpringOne Tour 2019 in St. Louis.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=}},
We're sorry to have missed you in St. Louis this week. Looking for slides from SpringOne Tour? You can find them, along with blogs, videos and all things Spring related here <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-tour-st-louis-2]]>. Please join us this October 7-10 in Austin, Texas to network and learn from Spring community leaders. Get $100 off your SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/]]> ticket by using the code Attendee_SpringOneTour_100 when you register!
Get started <[[https://pivotal.io/platform/pcf-tutorials/getting-started-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-springone-tour-stlouis-q119]]> with Spring on Cloud Foundry: for free on the public cloud, or on your workstation. I hope to see you at a future event <[[https://pivotal.io/events]]>!
Thanks,
Tasha Isenberg
